001package com.randomnoun.maven.plugin.yamlCombine;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileOutputStream;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.PrintWriter;
007import java.util.List;
008
009import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
010import org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo;
011import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
012import org.codehaus.plexus.logging.Logger;
013import org.codehaus.plexus.logging.console.ConsoleLoggerManager;
014import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
015import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
016import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
017import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
018import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProjectHelper;
019import org.apache.maven.settings.Settings;
020import org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet;
021import org.apache.maven.shared.utils.io.DirectoryScanner;
022import org.apache.maven.shared.utils.io.FileUtils;
023import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.DefaultMavenFileFilter;
024import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.MavenFilteringException;
025import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.MavenResourcesExecution;
026
027/**
028 * Maven goal which combines a bunch of yaml files into a big yaml file.
029 * 
030 * @blog http://www.randomnoun.com/wp/2021/06/29/swagger-combine/
031 */
032@Mojo (name = "yaml-combine", defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.GENERATE_SOURCES)
033
034public class YamlCombineMojo
035    extends AbstractMojo
036{
037        // FileSet handling from 
038        // https://github.com/apache/maven-jar-plugin/blob/maven-jar-plugin-3.2.0/src/main/java/org/apache/maven/plugins/jar/AbstractJarMojo.java
039
040    /**
041     * The input files to combine. Files that are included via <code>$xref</code> references do not need to be included in this fileset.
042     */
043    @Parameter( property="fileset")
044    private FileSet fileset;
045    
046    /**
047     * Directory containing the generated JAR.
048     */
049    @Parameter( defaultValue = "${project.build.directory}", required = true )
050    private File outputDirectory;
051
052    /**
053     * Name of the generated JAR.
054     */
055    @Parameter( defaultValue = "${project.build.finalName}", readonly = true )
056    private String finalName;
057
058    /**
059     * True to filter files before processing, in the maven copy-resources sense ( i.e. perform variable substitution ).
060     */
061    // Because that needed a new verb obviously.
062    @Parameter( property="filtering", defaultValue = "false", required = true )
063    private boolean filtering;
064
065    /**
066     * True to increase logging
067     */
068    @Parameter( property="verbose", defaultValue = "false", required = true )
069    private boolean verbose;
070    
071    
072    
073    /**
074     * The {@link {MavenProject}.
075     */
076    @Parameter( defaultValue = "${project}", readonly = true, required = true )
077    private MavenProject project;
078
079    /**
080     * The {@link MavenSession}.
081     */
082    @Parameter( defaultValue = "${session}", readonly = true, required = true )
083    private MavenSession session;
084
085    
086    /**
087     * @parameter property="settings"
088     * @required
089     * @since 1.0
090     * @readonly
091     */
092    private Settings settings;
093
094
095    /**
096     *
097     */
098    @org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Component
099    private MavenProjectHelper projectHelper;
100
101    
102    // private method in FileSetManager
103
104        private DirectoryScanner scan(FileSet fileSet) {
105                File basedir = new File(fileSet.getDirectory());
106                if (!basedir.exists() || !basedir.isDirectory()) {
107                        return null;
108                }
109
110                DirectoryScanner scanner = new DirectoryScanner();
111
112                String[] includesArray = fileSet.getIncludesArray();
113                String[] excludesArray = fileSet.getExcludesArray();
114
115                if (includesArray.length > 0) {
116                        scanner.setIncludes(includesArray);
117                }
118
119                if (excludesArray.length > 0) {
120                        scanner.setExcludes(excludesArray);
121                }
122
123                if (fileSet.isUseDefaultExcludes()) {
124                        scanner.addDefaultExcludes();
125                }
126
127                scanner.setBasedir(basedir);
128                scanner.setFollowSymlinks(fileSet.isFollowSymlinks());
129
130                scanner.scan();
131
132                return scanner;
133        }
134        
135        
136
137    
138    /**
139     * Generates the JAR.
140     * 
141     * @return The instance of File for the created archive file.
142     * @throws MojoExecutionException in case of an error.
143     */
144        public File createCombinedYaml() throws MojoExecutionException {
145                if (outputDirectory == null) {
146                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Missing outputDirectory");
147                }
148                if (finalName == null) {
149                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Missing finalName");
150                }
151                File destFile = new File(outputDirectory, finalName);
152
153                // filesets aren't order-preserving.
154                // which is kind of annoying. could sort the Files just to get some
155                // deterministic order I suppose
156
157                if (destFile.exists() && destFile.isDirectory()) {
158                        throw new MojoExecutionException(destFile + " is a directory.");
159                }
160                if (destFile.exists() && !destFile.canWrite()) {
161                        throw new MojoExecutionException(destFile + " is not writable.");
162                }
163
164                getLog().info("Creating combined yaml file " + destFile.getAbsolutePath());
165
166                if (!destFile.getParentFile().exists()) {
167                        // create the parent directory...
168                        if (!destFile.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
169                                // Failure, unable to create specified directory for some unknown reason.
170                                throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to create directory or parent directory of " + destFile);
171                        }
172                }
173                if (destFile.exists()) {
174                        // delete existing
175                        if (!destFile.delete()) {
176                                throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to delete existing file " + destFile);
177                        }
178                }
179
180                DirectoryScanner scanner = scan(fileset);
181                String[] files = scanner.getIncludedFiles(); // also performs exclusion. So way to go, maven.
182
183                // let's just have a single output file then.
184                FileOutputStream fos = null;
185                try {
186                        YamlCombiner sc = new YamlCombiner();
187                        sc.setRelativeDir(new File(fileset.getDirectory()));
188                        sc.setFiles(files);
189                        sc.setLog(getLog());
190                        
191                        fos = new FileOutputStream(destFile);
192                        if (filtering) {
193                                MavenResourcesExecution mre = new MavenResourcesExecution();
194                        mre.setMavenProject( project );
195                        mre.setFileFilters( null );
196                        mre.setEscapeWindowsPaths( true );
197                        mre.setMavenSession( session );
198                        mre.setInjectProjectBuildFilters( true );
199                        
200                        // there's probably a better way of getting a plexus Logger instance
201                        // but for the life of me I can't work it out 
202                        // after about 15 levels of indirection they end up not-properly wrapping slf4j anyway.
203                        // ( see https://maven.apache.org/ref/3.6.0/maven-embedder/apidocs/org/apache/maven/cli/logging/Slf4jLoggerManager.html )
204                        ConsoleLoggerManager clm = new ConsoleLoggerManager();
205                        Logger logger = clm.getLoggerForComponent("YamlCombineMojo");
206                        
207                        DefaultMavenFileFilter dmff = new DefaultMavenFileFilter();
208                        dmff.enableLogging(logger); // filter will NPE if this isn't set
209                        getLog().info("logger is " + logger);
210                                try {
211                                        List<FileUtils.FilterWrapper> filterWrappers = dmff.getDefaultFilterWrappers( mre );
212                                        sc.setFilterWrappers(filterWrappers);
213                                } catch (MavenFilteringException e) {
214                                        throw new IllegalStateException("Coult not get default filter wrappers", e);
215                                }
216                        }
217                        
218                        PrintWriter w = new PrintWriter(fos);
219                        sc.combine(w);
220                } catch (IOException ioe) {
221                        // trouble at the mill
222                        throw new MojoExecutionException("Could not create combined yaml file", ioe); 
223                } finally {
224                        if (fos != null) {
225                                try {
226                                        fos.close();
227                                } catch(IOException ioe) {
228                                        throw new IllegalStateException("IOException closing file", ioe);
229                                }
230                        }
231                }
232                return destFile;
233
234        }
235   
236    
237    public void execute()
238        throws MojoExecutionException
239    {
240        createCombinedYaml();
241    }
242    
243
244    
245    // getters / setters
246    
247    /**
248     * {@inheritDoc}
249     */
250    protected Boolean getFiltering() {
251        return filtering;
252    }
253   
254
255    /**
256     * {@inheritDoc}
257     */
258    protected Boolean getVerbose() {
259        return verbose;
260    }
261    
262    /**
263     * @return the project
264     */
265    public MavenProject getProject() {
266        return project;
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * @param project
271     * the project to set
272     */
273    public void setProject(final MavenProject project) {
274        this.project = project;
275    }
276
277    /**
278     * @return the settings
279     */
280    public Settings getSettings() {
281        return settings;
282    }
283
284    /**
285     * @param settings
286     * the settings to set
287     */
288    public void setSettings(final Settings settings) {
289        this.settings = settings;
290    }
291    
292}
